title: Sing A Song Of Six Trends, Pocket Full Of Zeit 12/16: Chris Noth, NBA, Build Back Better, Papa Johns, Michelle Odinet, Johnson & Johnson
itunes:title: Sing A Song Of Six Trends, Pocket Full Of Zeit 12/16: Chris Noth, NBA, Build Back Better, Papa Johns, Michelle Odinet, Johnson & Johnson
description:
In this edition of Sing A Song Of Six Trends, Jack and Miles discuss the Chris Noth/SatC/Peloton saga, NBA news, Build Back Better hitting a brick wall, Papa Johns getting into the pizza-making business, racist judge Michelle Odinet, and the CDC recommending anything but J&J's vaccine.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
